meanings.sent1: After losing his favorite toy, Timmy regains it from under the bed.
meanings.sent2: She regains her strength after resting for a while.
meanings.sent3: The lost puppy regains its wagging tail when it finds its way home.
meanings.sent4: As the sun rises, the sleepy town regains its bustling energy.
meanings.sent5: With determination, he regains his balance after stumbling on the rocky path.

meanings.definition: To reach or come to again
meanings.sent1: The hiker regains the mountain peak after a challenging climb.
meanings.sent2: After a brief pause, the music regains its lively tempo.
meanings.sent3: The phone regains signal as the storm passes by.
meanings.sent4: The runner regains his breath after sprinting to the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The lost book regains its place on the shelf after being misplaced.

meanings.sent1: The team regains the lead with a last-minute goal.
meanings.sent2: After a setback, she regains her confidence and continues with determination.
meanings.sent3: The magician regains control of the unruly rabbits during the magic show.
meanings.sent4: The captain regains command of the ship in the midst of a storm.
meanings.sent5: With hard work, she regains her position as the top student in the class.
